tool_description: This API will help you generate the QR Code required by Zatca KSA to be included in every invoice
name: QR Code Generator for Saudi ZATCA  Invoice
title: QR Code Generator for Saudi ZATCA  Invoice
tool_name: QR Code Generator for Saudi ZATCA  Invoice

api_list.name: /generateQR
api_list.description: Generate the QR in both base64 text and image base64
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-generator-for-saudi-zatca-invoice1.p.rapidapi.com/generateQR"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-generator-for-saudi-zatca-invoice1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-generator-for-saudi-zatca-invoice1.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
